Contact Person

The person(s) listed here will receive the quarterly "request for status update" emails. This person is the most suited to receive these emails and may or may not be the actual concept lead. Concept lead(s) and other co-investigators should be listed on the next form.

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'firstname', a.value, '')),    ' ',   max(if(a.field_name = 'lastname', a.value, '')),   ' | ',    max(if(a.field_name = 'email', a.value, ''))) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=2128 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'firstname', a.value, '')),    ' ',   max(if(a.field_name = 'lastname', a.value, '')),   ' | ',    max(if(a.field_name = 'email', a.value, ''))) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=2128 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT a.record, CONCAT( max(if(a.field_name = 'group_name', a.value, '')), ' (', max(if(a.field_name = 'group_abbr', a.value, '')), ') ' ) as value FROM redcap_data a WHERE a.project_id=2129 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

SELECT a.record, CONCAT( max(if(a.field_name = 'group_name', a.value, '')), ' (', max(if(a.field_name = 'group_abbr', a.value, '')), ') ' ) as value FROM redcap_data a WHERE a.project_id=2129 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

SELECT a.record, CONCAT( max(if(a.field_name = 'group_name', a.value, '')), ' (', max(if(a.field_name = 'group_abbr', a.value, '')), ') ' ) as value FROM redcap_data a WHERE a.project_id=2129 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

SELECT a.record, CONCAT( max(if(a.field_name = 'group_name', a.value, '')), ' (', max(if(a.field_name = 'group_abbr', a.value, '')), ') ' ) as value FROM redcap_data a WHERE a.project_id=2129 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'region_name', a.value, NULL)),    ' (',   max(if(a.field_name = 'region_code', a.value, NULL)),   ') ' ) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=2127 GROUP BY a.record  ORDER BY value

Field Label: Key Participant or Author

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Concept Lead (or co-Lead) | 2, Senior Author | 3, Statistician | 4, Data Manager | 5, Investigator/Regional Representative | 6, Other

SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'firstname', a.value, '')),    ' ',   max(if(a.field_name = 'lastname', a.value, '')),   ' | ',    max(if(a.field_name = 'email', a.value, ''))) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=2128 GROUP BY a.record ORDER BY value

Field Label:
Hello [configuration_arm_1][first_name], Please submit a brief status report on the following project for the upcoming Quarterly Project Review:

[configuration_arm_1][project_title]

We will use this info to report to the consortium.

Current Project Status
Please select the most recent status that applies to your concept sheet.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Approved | 2, Data requested | 3, Data analysis | 4, Abstract submitted | 5, Abstract accepted | 6, Manuscript submitted | 7, Manuscript under revision | 8, Published

Field Label:
Please give a 2-3 sentence update on this project.
This can include updates on data collection, preparation, and analysis; work on abstracts or manuscripts; writing group meetings; journal/conference submissions; or waiting periods (to receive data, to hear from reviewers, etc.)
Congratulations on your abstract/manuscript acceptance! We will send a follow up survey to capture the information about your abstract or manuscript.
Thank you! We will include your update in a status report for the consortium.
Scientific Outputs

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Manuscript | 2, Abstract | 3, Poster | 4, Presentation Slides | 5, Report | 99, Other

Field Label: PMID (e.g., 33876268, 8 character number) Use the Get PMID button to automatically populate the data in this form from PubMed after inputting the PMID.

Field Note: Note: Do not enter PMIDs, only PMCIDs

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Poster presentation | 2, Oral presentation | 9, Other | 0, Not applicable

Field Label:
Author List
Use PubMed format: (e.g., Duda SN, Vansell HJ, McGowan CC)
Journal / Conference Name (e.g., JAIDS, JIAS, CROI, IWHOD)

Citation
Use PubMed format: (e.g., J Int AIDS Soc. 2018 Feb; 21(S1):e25044)
Web link (URL) to resource (optional)

Short Title
Provide a short title for the document. This will be the clickable download link on the Hub interface.

Description
(optional) Provide a brief description of the document. This text will be displayed on the Hub interface.

File Upload
Use a ZIP to combine multiple files
